EmailTemplate.description: Notify Participant of change in baseline
EmailTemplate.name: 19Notify Participant of change in baseline
EmailTemplate.subject: DTW Alert: Your Deliver to Win baseline margin target has changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your participation in the Deliver to Win incentive plan for project 1{!EnrollmentPlan__c.Name}. Due to the recent change in the budget for this project, the baseline GM% has been changed to xx.xx%. This means that the threshold GM% required to earn an award has also changed. Please click the link below to view the current Incentive Status Report (ISR) for this project for details regarding the change
Link to Incentive Status Report
Thank you,
DTW Administrator
{!EnrollmentPlan__c.ReplyTo__c}
